modName: Ser Jorah Mormont Follower from HBO Game of Thrones
summary: My new character inspired by the HBO's GoT TV Show
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#ff7700][size=5][b]SER JORAH MORMONT[/b][/size][/color][b][size=5][color=#ff7700] Game of Thrones FOLLOWER
(standalone)
[/color][size=3][size=5]

I'm ProuD to Present you Ser Jorah Mormont as new follower for Skyrim
(i hope you enjoy)[/size][/size][/size][/b]
[b][size=5][size=3]
Textures: SkySight Skins - Ultra HD 4K and 2K - Male Textures and
Real Feet Meshes by [b]fadingsignal[/b]
Default Weapon : Bear Sword.
Location : The Drunken Huntsman (Whiterun)
Combat Style : boss 1H
[size=2][size=3]..and is unkillable[/size][/size][/size][/size][/b]

[color=#8e7cc3][b][size=5][size=3][size=2][size=3][size=5][b][size=3][size=4][size=3][Credits]
